query: Could you assist me in creating a 7-day trip plan starting from Seattle to California, exploring 3 different cities? The trip would span from March 23rd to March 29th, 2022 and the budget is now set at $6,400.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Redding,Oakland,Santa Rosa]
